availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Romulous J. Swope (Powell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Andrew Swope and Catharine Swope. Resident of Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Powell County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, District 2, p. 42. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, p. 18. Find A Grave, "Romulus J. Swope (1835-1906)," Memorial #46291425, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=46291425&ref=acom (accessed June 11, 2017). KYR-0001-029-0570.
